body_html:
The split_dim in sparse_split_op.cc is int32 type which causes the column wise tests(where split_dim should be 1) to fail on Big Endian system as the "context->input(0).scalar()();" returns 0 all the time.

Could you review the change please?
body_text:
The split_dim in sparse_split_op.cc is int32 type which causes the column wise tests(where split_dim should be 1) to fail on Big Endian system as the "context->input(0).scalar()();" returns 0 all the time.
Could you review the change please?
body:
The split_dim in sparse_split_op.cc is int32 type which causes the column wise tests(where split_dim should be 1) to fail on Big Endian system as the "context->input(0).scalar<int>()();" returns 0 all the time.

Could you review the change please?
